name: Anse Major: House of Smoke
description: Plantation ruin. Nine smoke curls from chimney form skull. Two nailed leather straps under a step. Seven scorched letters on lintel. Phantom figure crosses cracked window. Riddle: The house that burns without flame counts its own breath.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Plantation ruin. Nine smoke curls from chimney form skull. Two nailed leather straps under a step. Seven scorched letters on lintel. Phantom figure crosses cracked window.. Key props numeric: 9 smokeCurls, 2 straps, 7 letters. Cipher letter: A Bearing: 110°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
